body:
Ei, they made the webtoon into a manga.
I prefer this format honestly. Even though it isnt colored. The art of the original is a bit inconsistent.

Part 1: 384296 | Part 2: 361148 | Part 3: 384297 (this). As mentioned in part 2's comments, the first part got anime adaptation (one of those short episodes anime for older female segment). That title though. Jimihen sounds like abbreviation for Jimi Hendrix, but it's not music manga. XD This one is released last month.
Holy shit i love that glasses girl, she look really cute
